page.title: 13Education Littlebourne Area
page.content: There are 2 primary schools (age5-11) in the area. Both are Church schools. L'bourne serves Lackenden, Woolton + Elbridge. W'breux serves Stodmarsh, Grove + Ickham. L'bourne school is used for WEA evening classes, these have included Local History, Architecture, Antiques + Woodlands. Mrs Robertson also gives piano lessons L'bourne School (1971) is a modern semi open plan building with Hall, Library + 4 class rooms. This year there are 104 children divided into 4 class rooms with 5 teachers. The curriculum is very wide with many extra activities - choir, swimming, sponsorsed spellings, cricket, football. School services are held in the church + Nativity Play at Chistmas. Each year there is a School Fair + the children make posters for the Best Kept Village Competition.
